summary: This is an email chain from June 22, 2020, discussing the imminent arrest and charging of Ghislaine Maxwell. It details the planned charges, her suspected location in Massachusetts, and coordination between FBI personnel regarding the investigation and arrest timeline.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email chain; the FBI is in the process of charging her with multiple federal crimes including conspiracy, enticement, transportation of minors, and perjury.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in a forwarded question from a Deputy Director (DD) asking about the status of the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: The author providing updates on the Maxwell investigation, planned charges, her suspected location, and the arrest timeline.

connections.description: Maxwell is being investigated for crimes related to Epstein's activities, and the investigation into Epstein is referenced in the same context.
The SSA is leading the investigation and planning the arrest of Maxwell.
Ma is forwarding information from the SSA FBI New York to other parties in the email chain.

events.title: Planning Maxwell's Arrest and Charges
events.description: FBI officials coordinate via email, detailing the plan to charge Ghislaine Maxwell via indictment, listing the specific federal charges, and discussing her suspected location and the timing of her arrest.

events.title: SDNY Conference Call on Arrest Timeline
events.description: The SSA FBI New York mentions a planned conference call with the Southern District of New York (SDNY) to discuss moving up Maxwell's arrest from an initial August timeline to within the next few weeks.

keyFacts: On June 22, 2020, the FBI was actively planning to arrest Ghislaine Maxwell and charge her via indictment.
The planned federal charges included conspiracy to entice, enticement, conspiracy to transport minors, transportation of minors, and two counts of perjury.
Investigators believed Maxwell was in Massachusetts, quarantining at a boyfriend's house, based on phone records and online purchase activity.
The arrest was initially considered for August 2020 but was being discussed for acceleration to within a few weeks.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination and includes a high-level question about the status of the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
